name: Rat Run
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinite ~ Palette Jam!

The theme was "Underground" so I made a game about sewer rats. In researching for this game I learned that rats can jump a horizontal distance of up to 4 feet, wow.

This is my first game ever!!

How to play:

Press space bar to jump.

If you fall in the water or get caught off screen you lose.
